result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ramon A. Morrison

records.addlTxt:
9:46 AM Defendant Ramon A. Morrison by zoom, in custody.  Attorney Alexander Huber in court for State of Wisconsin.  Clerk HM.  Attorney Xavier Solis in court for Ramon A. Morrison. Clerk HM. Atty Solis just appointed.  Atty Solis requests adjmt to have discussions with State.    Atty Solis will file be filing a bond motion.  FPT scheduled. Bond continued.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 09:30 am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.  *No Weapons especially firearms   No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Milaysiah M. A.   The DE may make arrangements with a party or law enforcement to retrieve personal property and/or medication from the victim, M.A.'s residence within 24 hours of signing the bond in this case.  The DE may not be the party retrieving any property and/or medication.

01:19 PM   Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Michelle Knapp.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered. Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 01:40 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 09:30 am. $750  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  sg
and witness list filed by the State
